if-code-question5_key2: Take user input in a variable named varx.
if-code-question5_key3: Convert it to an integer.
if-code-question5_key4: Check if this number is divisible by 2.
if-code-question5_key5: You can achieve this by using the modulus operator. Remember, modulus operator returns the remainder of the division of first operand by the second operand. Example:
if-code-question5_key6: 6 % 2 returns 0 as the output because 2 completely divides 6 and the remainder is 0.
if-code-question5_key7: But 9 % 2 returns 1 as the output since 2 does not completely divide 9. The remainder is 1.
if-code-question5_key8: To conclude, 6 is divisible by 2 but 9 is not divisible by 2.
if-code-question5_key9: If the number is divisible by 2, print Divisible else print Not Divisible
if-code-question5_key11: Create the flowchart and code and submit both of them.
